title: Shoukoushi Cedie (Little Lord Fauntleroy)
synopsis: After his father's sudden death, Ceddie moves to England as an heir to his grandfather, the Earl of Dorincourt.
voices: ['Orikasa, Ai', 'Shibamoto, Hiroyuki', 'Yoshida, Rihoko', 'Ogawa, Shinji', 'Watabe, Takeshi', 'Munakata, Tomoko', 'Shimada, Bin', 'Takayama, Minami', 'Sakuma, Rei', 'Mita, Yuuko']
